title: "View validation guidelines"

This topic describes how to view the guidelines for the validation report associated with a template. This topic is relevant for model validaators who want to make sure they are following the guidelines for their validation report.  

## Prerequisites

* You are a registered user on the ValidMind platform
* The model you are documenting is registered in the model inventory
* A documentation project has already been submitted for review by the model validation team for this project
* You are logged in to the ValidMind platform


## Steps

1. In any section of the Validation Report, click on the "ValidMind Insights" button on the top-right corner to expand the ValidMind Insights right-hand side bar **Need image**
   - The "Validation Guidelines" tab shows the validation guidelines associated with this model, and have been configured by the Model Validation team
   - The "Comments" tab shows the comment threads associated with this section of the validation report

*Note: The validation guidelines for each template can be configured by an Administrator.**
